item.title: New York Times Connections Hints and Answers for #482 October 5, 2024
item.description:
Connections is a daily word-sorting puzzle that requires a lot of thinking outside the box. In this game, you need to put sixteen words into four secret categories, and you don't have a lot of mistakes you can make.

So if you already know how to play Connections and are lost on this puzzle, you can find some information on each of the categories below. No matter what kind of information you need to solve this puzzle, you will find it in this article.

Words in the NYT Connections Puzzle #482 for October 5, 2024

The Connections puzzle for today contains the words: Jacuzzi, Bikini, Hangar, X-Ray, Q-Tip, Toothbrush, G-String, Chapstick, T-Bone, Xerox, Hipster, Skirt, Drill, Filet, Sink, and Thong.

Hints for the NYT Connections Puzzle

In the next sections, you will find a whole bunch of different kinds of hints for this free mobile game similar to Wordle . Open them up by pressing the Read More buttons below them.

Some General Hints for the Whole Connections Puzzle

Yellow NYT Connections Category Hints

Yellow Connections Category Answer

Yellow Connections Category Answer and All Four Words

Green NYT Connections Category Hints

Green Connections Category Answer

Green Connections Category Answer and All Four Words

Blue NYT Connections Category Hints

Blue Connections Category Answer

Blue Connections Category Answer and All Four Words

Purple NYT Connections Category Hints

Purple Connections Category Answer

Purple Connections Category Answer and All Four Words

Answers for Today's NYT Connections #482 for October 5, 2024

The full solution to this puzzle game can be found in the expandable section below. Open it up, and it will reveal all the categories and the words that belong in them.

Want to play? Check out the New York Times Games Connections website available on almost any device with a browser.

item.title: WoW: The War Within - Complete Fishing Guide
item.description:
Quick Links

  • Where to Learn Khaz Algar Fishing
  • All Khaz Algar Fish
  • Hallowfall Fishing Derby

While you can only ever have two professions on a single character in World of Warcraft , you are not limited that way with the secondary professions. You don't have to choose between Cooking or Fishing, you can have both. While it isn't mandatory, fishing is a useful skill for players to learn in World of Warcraft . Not only is it a good way to get materials for cooking, but also it is a good way to get cosmetics and make some money from selling fish on the Auction House.

Unlike other professions, Khaz Algar fishing has a maximum skill cap of 300 rather than 100. There aren't many changes to fishing in World of Warcraft: The War Within , but it is still a good way to spend some time while you are waiting in a dungeon queue.

Where to Learn Khaz Algar Fishing

As with any profession in World of Warcraft , the first step is to learn the skill. You can find a Fishing Trainer named Drokar in Dornogal at (X,Y) 50,27. There is even a Fishing Supplies vendor next to them as well.

Once you've learned Khaz Algar Fishing, it is not a bad idea to obtain a Algari Weaverline and attach it to your fishing pole. This item can be either crafted through Tailoring or by commissioning another player to make one for you via a Crafting Order. Algari Weaverline will allow you to obtain and use Algari Seekerthread and Algari Anglerthread. Both of these items permanently increase your Skill and Perception in Khaz Algar Fishing up to a maximum of 100. These two items can be obtained from fishing anywhere in Khaz Algar, or they can be purchased from the Fishing Derby vendor.

All Khaz Algar Fish

There are 20 different fish that are indigenous to Khaz Algar. Below is a table of where each fish can be found, along with what pools you can find them in.

Fish Name

Zones It Can Be Fished In

Pools It Can Be Found In

Bismuth Bitterling

Isle of Dorn, The Ringing Deeps

Glimmerpool

Bloody Perch

Isle of Dorn, The Ringing Deeps, Hallowfall

Swarm of Slum Sharks, Blood in the Water, Festering Rotpool, Bloody Perch Swarm, Calm Surfacing Ripple

Crystalline Sturgeon

Isle of Dorn, The Ringing Deeps

Glimmerpool

Dilly-Dally Dace

Isle of Dorn, The Ringing Deeps, Hallowfall

Calm Surfacing Ripple, Blood in the Water, Festering Rotpool

Dornish Pike

Isle of Dorn, The Ringing Deeps, Hallowfall

Calm Surfacing Ripple

Goldengill Trout

Isle of Dorn, The Ringing Deeps, Hallowfall, Azj-Kahet

Glimmerpool, Festering Rotpool, Infused Ichor Spill

Kaheti Slum Shark

Hallowfall, Azj-Kahet

Blood in the Water, Slum Shark Swarm

Nibbling Minnow

Isle of Dorn, The Ringing Deeps, Hallowfall, Azj-Kahet

Calm Surfacing Ripple

Pale Huskfish

Azj-Kahet

Infused Ichor Spill, Festering Rotpool

Roaring Anglerseeker

Isle of Dorn, The Ringing Deeps, Hallowfall, Azj-Kahet

Anglerseeker Torrent

Specular Rainbowfish

Isle of Dorn, The Ringing Deeps

Glimmerpool

Whispering Stargazer

Isle of Dorn, The Ringing Deeps, Hallowfall

Stargazer Swarm

Isle of Dorn, The Ringing Deeps

Calm Surfacing Ripple, River Bass Pool

Cursed Ghoulfish

All of Khaz Algar

All Pools

Queen's Lurefish

Hallowfall, Azj-Kahet

Royal Ripple

Awakened Coelacanth

Azj-Kahet

Requires a Whispering Stargazer

Regal Dottyback

Hallowfall, Azj-Kahet

Royal Ripple

Spiked Sea Raven

Isle of Dorn, Hallowfall

Calm Surfacing Ripple, Glimmerpool, Stargazer Swarm, Anglerseeker Torrent

Sanguine Dogfish

All Khaz Algar Zones

Bloody Perch Swarm, Blood in the Water

Arathor Hammerfish

Hallowfall

Blood in the Water

Hallowfall Fishing Derby

Weekend fishing events are not exactly new in World of Warcraft. The War Within added a new event every Saturday called the Hallowfall Fishing Derby. Unlike the Stranglethorn Fishing Extravaganza or the long-since-removed Kalu'ak Fishing Derby, this is not an event where only a handful of players can win.

Every Saturday, Captain Oathmyt in Hallowfall will have a special quest. She will task you with catching three specific fish within one hour. If you are successful, you earn Mereldar Derby Marks which you can use to purchase items from her. Captain Oathmyt only spawns on Saturdays, so if you want to purchase anything from her, make sure to do so on Saturday as she doesn't show up on any other day.

item.title: Best Capcom Game From Every Year In The '90s
item.description: Capcom released games during the 90s that shaped the gaming industry as we know it. In this video, we're talking about the best Capcom game from each year in the 90s like Resident Evil and Street Fighter 2.

item.title: New York Times Strands Hints and Answers for October 5, 2024
item.description:
Strands has yet another challenging puzzle to ponder over. If you are stuck on this one, you aren't alone; this puzzle has a bunch of difficult words hidden inside its jumbled-up letter grid, themed around a challenging concept.

Thankfully, you can find all the help you need in the sections below. Inside these, you can find everything from general hints to spoilers, and more. No matter what you need to complete this one, it will be in this article.

The NYT Games Strands Puzzle #216 November 5, 2024

The Strands puzzle for today has the clue No Way! There are eight things to find including the Spangram and seven themed words.

New York Times Games Strands Clues

Inside the sections below, you can find spoiler-free hints for the Strands . If you already know how to play Strands , you know there is an in-game hint system that gives away whole words; these hints are spoiler free and useful to help you get closer to the theme.

General Hint 1

General Hint 2

General Hint 3

Spoilers for Two of the Words in Today's Strands

Below, you can find two different spoiled words for this free-to-play puzzle game. Open up the expandable sections below to see the word and where it belongs in the puzzle's letter grid.

Spoiler 1

Spoiler 2

The Answer to Today's New York Times Games Strands

The answer to this minimalist puzzle game is in the section below. Inside, you can find a screenshot of a completed puzzle along with all the words you need to complete it yourself.

Today's Strands Explained

Today's theme and clue might not make much sense to you, even after the puzzle is complete. If you are still stuck on this one, check out the full explanation for how it all goes together in this challenging puzzle game.

Want to play? Check out the New York Times Games Strands website available on almost any device with a browser.

item.title: 10 Skins We Want To See In Fortnitemares
item.description:
Key Takeaways

  • Fortnite has grown to include licensed spooky skins like Leatherface, Alien, and Michael Myers.
  • Fans eagerly anticipate new skins during Fortnitemares.
  • Potential skins like Freddy Fazbear and Clickers from The Last of Us could add to the creepy fun.

Since 2017, Fortnite has treated fans to Fortnitemares: spooky in-game fun celebrating the Halloween season. What started simply with the addition of creepy skins and the Jack-O-Launcher soon evolved into a chaotic yearly event of Cube Monsters, creepy quests, and new skins.

Now every year, Fortnite fans expect something bigger and better, especially when it comes to new skins. Original skins with a horror twist and licensed characters appear in the Item Shop with each new Fortnitemares update. With so many horror franchises and spooky themes to draw inspiration from, a fan's wishlist for new Fortnitemares skins keeps growing.

10 Buffy Summers

A Highschooler Turned Iconic Vampire Slayer

  • Featured in: Buffy the Vampire Slayer (1997-2003)

Cosmetics Wishlist

Outfit

Buffy Summers Classic Leather Jacket Outfit

Style

Buffy Summers Cheerleader Outfit

Back Bling

Vampyr Book

Pickaxe

Wooden Stakes

Glider

Hellmouth Portal

Emote

Spinning Kick Stake Attack

Buffy the Vampire Slayer is a TV show that mixes horror and humor in a way that fits perfectly with Fortnitemares. Both Buffy and Fortnitemares blend action and monster battles with an irreverent vibe. Buffy The Vampire Slayer has a long cast of characters to choose from when looking for cosmetic ideas but it is best to start with The Chosen One: Buffy Summers.

She is strong and athletic and would prove to be very popular if she appeared in the Fortnite Item Shop. The vampire Spike would be the next best choice for players as his bad-boy demeanor would fit well in the Fortnitemares event.

9 Jason Voorhees

The Brutal and Haunting Killer of Crystal Lake

  • Featured in: Friday the 13th series (1980-2009)

Cosmetics Wishlist

Outfit

Jason Voorhees Classic Hockey Mask

Style

Jason Voorhees Unmasked

Back Bling

Machete, Holstered

Pickaxe

Machete

Glider

A Chained Buoy

Emote

Machete Sharpening

Jason Voorhees is the cursed killer of Camp Crystal Lake who stalks and murders teens in the classic Friday The 13th movie franchise. Fortnite fans have been begging Epic Games to add Jason to the game for years, but to no avail. The imposing and supernatural figure of Jason, in that recognizable hockey mask, would make such a creepy addition to the Fortnitemares line-up.

The horror icon would certainly be an intimidating and creepy character in the game. It would be easy to see him slashing his way through Cube Monsters! Fortnite already has Michael Myers and Leatherface from other horror franchises, so Jason is surely next on the list.

8 Mulder and Scully

The Duo of FBI Agents That Investigate the Horrors of the Paranormal

  • Featured in: The X-Files (1993-2018)

Cosmetics Wishlist

Outfit

Mulder's Classic FBI Suit

Style

Scully's Classic FBI Suit

Back Bling

I Want To Believe Poster

Pickaxe

Giant Flashlight

Glider

UFO

Emote

Abduction By A UFO

The spooky duo from the long-running TV show, The X-Files, could prove to be popular Fortnite skins, especially during Fortnitemares. The X-Files centers on the supernatural, deep conspiracies, and strange happenings, much like the Fortnite universe. FBI agents Fox Mulder and Dana Scully should come as a pair of skins in a bundle so players can switch between them whenever they like.

With so many monsters around during the Fortnitemares event, players will need some experts to turn to. Who better to help Jonesy and the team defeat the next horde, than the experts who have seen things beyond anyone's imagination?

7 Carrie White

A Bullied Teenage Girl Who Possess Telekinetic Powers

  • Featured in: Carrie (1976), Carrie (2013)

Cosmetics Wishlist

Outfit

Carrie's Prom Dress

Style

Carrie's Bloody Prom Dress

Back Bling

Bleeding Crucifix

Pickaxe

Telekinetic Forces

Glider

Eerie Floating

Emote

Using Powers To Flip Cars

Carrie has risen to popularity again in recent years thanks to the remake of the classic 1976 movie starring Sissy Spacek. Most people now know about her abnormal powers and vengeful scenes following that fateful prom night, and where better to showcase them than during a Halloween event in a popular video game?

Fortnitemares is home to otherworldly creatures so Carrie should feel right at home among the ghosts and ghouls. If she does start to feel bullied when facing sweaty squads or hordes of Cube Monsters, she can always fight back with her telekinetic powers. Her sweet but scary vibe would fit in well in the Fortnite universe even after Fortnitemares has ended.

6 Pyramid Head

The Immortal Monster Who Roams Silent Hill

  • Featured in: Silent Hill 2 (2001)

Cosmetics Wishlist

Outfit

Pyramid Head

Style

Bloody Pyramid Head

Back Bling

Twisted Barbed Wire

Pickaxe

Great Knife

Glider

Chained Cage

Emote

Slice And Slash (Great Knife)

Pyramid Head from Silent Hill would make any Fortnite player run for safety thanks to his blood-stained apron and unwieldy knife. The voiceless and deadly monster is an antagonist in both Silent Hill and Dead By Daylight , so bringing him to Fortnite could stir up a lot of interest, particularly during the Fortnitemares event .

Pyramid Head is scary and intimidating, which could make a very popular choice of character, especially in solo Battle Royale mode. Pyramid Head certainly wouldn't look out of place in a horde rush as players attempt to take out swathes of Cube Monsters, and now is the perfect chance considering the Bloober remake of Silent Hill 2 .

5 Sanderson Sisters

Back From The Dead To Create Magic And Mayhem

  • Featured in: Hocus Pocus (1993) and Hocus Pocus 2 (2022)

Cosmetics Wishlist

Outfit

Winifred

Style

Mary and Sarah

Back Bling

Witch Cloaks

Pickaxe

Book

Glider

Broomstick

Emote

Flying on a Broomstick (Traversal)

The Sanderson Sisters - Winifred, Mary, and Sarah - made a return to the big screen after a 29-year absence with the anticipated Hocus Pocus 2 in 2022. Since they now have a brand-new audience, all three would make fun Fortnite skins. The movies featuring the three witches are a Halloween staple, and many families watch them every year.

This popularity, particularly around October, means the three spooky witches could be very popular as skins in Fortnitemares. Having the Sanderson Sisters flying into the Fortnite map would be quite an amazing sight.

4 Pearl

The Obsessive Woman On The Brink Of Insanity

  • Featured in: X (2022) and Pearl (2022)

Cosmetics Wishlist

Outfit

Pearl The Farm Girl

Style

Pearl's Red Dress

Back Bling

Scarecrow Head

Pickaxe

Bloodied Axe

Glider

Motorcar

Emote

Audition Dance

Modern horror icon Pearl could make a unique and creepy skin in Fortnite, particularly if she had that unsettling smile from the end credits on her face the entire time. It would be especially apt if the sweatiest Fortnite players used the skin of this obsessive and sinister character. Being tracked down by a crazed, smiling woman in overalls would be pretty frightening.

Fortnitemares is all about the creepy and the kooky, so, of course, this axe-wielding maniac would fit in fine. If Pearl entered the world of Fortnite during the Fortnitemares event, she would easily take on hordes of monsters with her axe and pitchfork.

3 Betelgeuse

A Fun-Loving And Malicious Demon From Beetlejuice

  • Featured in: Beetlejuice (1988) and Beetlejuice, Beetlejuice (2024)

Cosmetics Wishlist

Outfit

Classic Betelgeuse Striped Suit

Style

Shrunken Head Betelgeuse

Back Bling

Handbook For The Recently Deceased

Pickaxe

Graveyard Shovel

Glider

Sand Worm

Emote

Head Shrink

Fortnite: Save the World has a Beetlejuice-inspired skin (Beetlejess), but nothing would compare to the real thing. Both Fortnite and Beetlejuice are full of action and comedic moments so to see the two worlds collide would be perfect. The character of Betelgeuse seems like such an obvious choice for Fortnitemares, thanks to his long-standing status as a spooky movie icon.

If Fortnite ever adds the snarky demon, players should expect to see other characters too such as Lydia Deets and Bob The Shrunken Head. The endless possible emotes Fortnite could introduce, such as the Banana Boat Day-O scene, would also add to the fun!

2 Freddy Fazbear

An Animatronic Nightmare

  • Featured in: Five Nights At Freddy's franchise (2014 - present day)

Cosmetics Wishlist

Outfit

Freddy Fazbear

Style

Bonnie, Chica, Springtrap

Back Bling

Freddy's Microphone

Pickaxe

Pizza Cutter

Glider

Deflated Balloon

Emote

Jumpscare

Freddy Fazbear from Five Nights At Freddy's is another skin the community has been asking about for years now. The horror fiction franchise is highly popular and would be a great crossover for Fortnite, especially during Fortnitemares. Freddy and his friends would make for a very creepy squad to come across!

Undoubtedly, rumors will keep circulating about the addition of Freddy, Chica, Bonnie, and Springtrap until the crossover is finally confirmed. The strange and creepy animatronic animals hold a special place in many young gamers' hearts, so the addition of them to Fortnitemares makes a lot of sense.

1 Clicker

A Horrifying Fungal-Human Hybrid

  • Featured in: The Last Of Us (2013), The Last of Us Part 2 (2020)

Cosmetics Wishlist

Outfit

Clicker

Style

Bloater

Back Bling

Cordyceps Fungus Bloom

Pickaxe

Beserk Mode

Glider

Giant Cordyceps Fungus

Emote

Twitching Clicker Walk (Traversal)

Clickers from The Last Of Us are grotesque former humans overtaken by the fungus and would make perfectly hideous skins in Fortnitemares. Fortnite could also put its own spin on the cosmetics by giving them Cube Monster effects, with purple skin and glowing effects. If adding Clickers is a scary step too far for the PEGI 12 game, then Ellie and Joel would also make a fine pair of skins in Fortnite .

They just wouldn't be as fun to look at. Fortnitemares is an event fraught with dangerous monsters, so the hideous Clicker would just add to the already horrifying scene. The fungus-zombie creatures were once human so it is also possible to add the cordyceps detailing to original skins like Jones, Spitfire, or Ramirez.
